name: Adventures of orange mouse. Parkour Game.
name_original: Adventures of orange mouse. Parkour Game.
description:
Let's go on an adventure! Parkour with the orange mouse, go through different levels of difficulty and just have fun and fun!

Every two weeks, new levels and factions will appear in the updates!

To start the game, you need to unpack the archive to any folder on your computer, and run the file "ParcureGame.exe"

Minimum System Requirements Windows
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: 64-bit from at least 2016
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Dedicated graphics card
  • Storage: 1GB available space
